## Template Description
This template connects a weapon to the offender and infraction. If multiple weapon types apply to the incident/offender submit multiple records.

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and school numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).  

`123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `SUBMITTING DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - INCIDENT ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={30} /></p>

An identifier assigned by the LEA to the incident; this identifier must be unique within each LEA per school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`9801`
</details>

---
### 3 - OFFENDER ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={20} /></p>

An identifier for the offender involved in an incident.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Must be the same value used in Field 2 - [PERSON ID](docs/templates/discipline/person.mdx#2---person-id) within the Person Template and in Field 3 - [OFFENDER ID](docs/templates/discipline/incident-offender-infraction.mdx#3---offender-id) of the Incident Offender Infraction Template.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`887`
</details>

---
### 4 - INFRACTION CODE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={2} /></p>

The code of the infraction for the offender.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Use a constant value of `54`, denoting Possession of Weapon in the Incident Offender Infraction Template.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`54`
</details>

---
### 5 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2024-06-30`
</details>

---
### 6 - WEAPON CODE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={20} /></p>

If weapons were involved, specify the type of weapon for this incident, offender, and infraction. If more than one type of weapon is involved report each type in a separate record.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if [Field 4 (INFRACTION CODE)](#4---infraction-code) is `54`.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AQ](docs/appendix/appendix-AQ.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.
</details>

---
### 7 - WEAPON COUNT
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={4} /></p>

The count of weapons of the type in [WEAPON CODE](#6---weapon-code) involved in this incident for this offender and infraction.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if [Field 4 (INFRACTION CODE)](#4---infraction-code) is `54`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`1`
</details>

---
## Rules
See the Rules Section of the Template Domain
